amendment.description: Amendment adds brownfield redevelopment, as specifically defined in the Small Business Liability Relief and Brownfield Revitalization Act of 2001, to the list of exemptions contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-266 to specify that the term economic development in the bill does not include the redevelopment of brownfield sites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
